articles.description: China has approved three COVID-19 vaccine candidates for clinical trials.
articles.content:
China plans to inject Chinese medics with coronavirus vaccines by year-end to protect them to deal with any emergency situation, while 11 new confirmed COVID-19 cases were reported in the country with no deaths due to the virus, health officials said.

articles.author: https://www.ibtimes.sg/reporters/manthan-chheda
articles.title: Coronavirus treatment's side effects cause Wuhan doctors' skin to turn black - International Business Times, Singapore Edition
articles.description: Dr. Yi and Dr. Hu, two doctors from Wuhan were diagnosed with coronavirus in January, and now their skin has turned dark due to liver damage from side effects of the treatment.
articles.content:
Two Chinese doctors who were in critical condition after being infected with coronavirus have seen their skin turned dark after recovering from the deadly disease.
